Aden Vanguard Captain Adolph:
Oh, it's you! I'm sure you already know, but the Kingdom hasn't reached out this far. But of course we can't just stand and watch what's going on. That's why King Cadmus has sent us, the Aden Vanguard, here to find out the situation.
Unfortunately, our missions are top secret, so we can't get any official aid. That's why we need you.
